title: PlayerPoints请问这个点券插件的数据库怎么修改和创建？
txt_content:
storage: YAML
mysql:
  host: localhost
  port: 3306
  database: minecraft
  user: username
  password: pass
  table: playerpoints
  import:
    use: false
    source: YAML
  export:
    use: false
    source: SQLITE
  retry: 10
vote:
  enabled: false
  amount: 100
  online: false
restrictions:
  autocompleteOnline: false
  hasPlayedBefore: false
debug:
  database: false
  uuid: false
vault: false
version: 2.1.5-SNAPSHOT

replies.author: 女神M哥
replies.txt_content:
首先你需要下载phpstudy
其次 按照我这样配置

storage: mysql
mysql:
  host: localhost
  port: 3306
  database: test
  user: root
  password: root
  table: playerpoints
  import:
    use: false
    source: YAML
  export:
    use: false
    source: SQLITE
  retry: 10
vote:
  enabled: false
  amount: 100
  online: false
restrictions:
  autocompleteOnline: false
  hasPlayedBefore: false
debug:
  database: false
  uuid: false
vault: false
version: 2.1.5-SNAPSHOT

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
storage: YAML
改为 
storage: MySQL

mysql:
  host: 数据库的 ip
  port: 端口
  database: minecraft
  user: 账号名
  password: 密码

就这样，库和表会自动创建的

xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-26 13:52
storage: YAML
改为 
storage: MySQL
表示没用

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
2248570515 发表于 2020-1-26 14:59
表示没用
然而你只说一个没用那可就真没用了。

至少要说你干了什么，改了什么，数据库是否开启了，还有上传 log
